GK20hdratn_u:1518: yo 'syāḥ pāṇigrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati sa sārvabhaumo rājā bhaviṣyatīti |
GK20hdratn_u:1519: tatas tatpratyayād asmābhiḥ svāmino 'rthe bahuśaḥ prārthyamānenāpi siṃhaleśvareṇa devyā vāsavadattāyāś cittakhedaṃ pariharatā yadā na dattā |
GK20hdratn_u:1522: tadā lāvaṇake devī dagdheti prasiddhim utpādya tadantikaṃ bābhravyaḥ prahitaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1526: atheyaṃ devīhaste kim ity anucintya sthāpitā |
GK20hdratn_u:1528: aṇācakkhidaṃ pi edaṃ jāṇīadi jjevva jadhā |
GK20hdratn_u:1529: anteuragadā suheṇa de daṃsaṇapadhaṃ gamissadi tti |
GK20hdratn_u:1534: anyathāntaḥpure baddhāyā asyāḥ kuto devena darśanam |
GK20hdratn_u:1537: parijñātāyāś ca bhaginyāḥ saṃprati yathā karaṇīyaṃ tatra devī pramāṇam |
GK20hdratn_u:1538: (4.186) Vāsavadattā | ajjautta | phuḍāṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā | paḍivādehi me raaṇāvaliṃ ti |
GK20hdratn_u:1539: (4.187) Vidūṣakaḥ | bhodi | suṭṭhu tae jāṇido amaccassa ahippāo |
GK20hdratn_u:1542: ettiaṃ pi dāva mama bahiṇiāṇurūvaṃ bhodu |
GK20hdratn_u:1543: iti ratnāvalīṃ svakīyair ābharaṇair alaṅkṛtya haste gṛhītvā rājānam upasṛtya |
GK20hdratn_u:1546: (4.189) Rājā | saharṣaṃ hastau prasārya | ko devyāḥ prasādaṃ na bahu manyate |
GK20hdratn_u:1550: tā tadhā karesu jadhā bandhujaṇaṃ ṇa sumaredi | iti samarpayati |
GK20hdratn_u:1559: (4.195) Yaugandharāyaṇaḥ | deva | kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyam upakaromi |
GK20hdratn_u:1560: (4.196) Rājā | kim ataḥ param api priyam asti | yataḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1563: devī prītim upāgatā ca bhaginīlābhāj jitāḥ kosalāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1564: kiṃ nāsti tvayi saty amātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām || 84 || (4.21)
GK20hdratn_u:1566: urvīm uddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjanvāsavo vṛṣṭim iṣṭām
GK20hdratn_u:1568: ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyat samupacitasukhaḥ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ
GK20hdratn_u:1569: niḥśeṣā yāntu śāntiṃ piśunajanagiro durjayā vajralepāḥ || 84 || (4.22)
